```{r 1}
library(tidyverse)
nobel <- read.csv("nobel_nominations.csv", stringsAsFactors = F, header = F)
nobel2 <- nobel %>%
  filter(V1 == "Che") %>%
  group_by(V3) %>%
  summarize(n = n())
```

```{r 2}
nobel3 <- nobel %>%
  select(V1, V3) %>%
  distinct

nobel_count <- as.data.frame(table(nobel3$V3))

nobel_count <- nobel_count %>%
  filter(Freq > 1)
```
